Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with constant value, camelcase = True

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE (root = {"NumericField": 12, "StringField": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null})

Input.Description: Select w/ DataObject initializer, camelcase = True

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE {"NumericField": 12, "StringField": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null} FROM root

Input.Description: Deeper than top level reference, camelcase = True
Input.Expression: query.Select(doc => IIF((doc.NumericField > 12), new DataObjectDotNet() {NumericField = 12, StringField = "12"}, new DataObjectDotNet() {NumericField = 12, StringField = "12"}))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ((root["numericField"] > 12) ? {"NumericField": 12, "StringField": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null} : {"NumericField": 12, "StringField": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null}) FROM root

Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with member initialization, camelcase = True
Input.Expression: query.Where(doc => (doc == new DataObjectDotNet() {NumericField = doc.NumericField, StringField = doc.StringField})).Select(b => "A")

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE "A" FROM root WHERE (root = {"numericField": root["numericField"], "stringField": root["stringField"]})

Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with member initialization, camelcase = False
Input.Expression: query.Where(doc => (doc == new DataObjectDotNet() {NumericField = doc.NumericField, StringField = doc.StringField})).Select(b => "A")

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE "A" FROM root WHERE (root = {"NumericField": root["NumericField"], "StringField": root["StringField"]})
